arStrings.szText: {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} leaves a trail that lasts for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds and deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while {c_important}Blood Mist{/c} is active.
